thread.title: ian galloway
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by ian galloway

author: ian galloway
title: ian galloway
text: The Warrior Pro Day Trading Course is the most fascinating course I've ever taken. It provides a thorough explanation of the skills and strategies used in trading stocks. My journey began when I injured my right arm and was unable to work. After looking at every stock trading video, and book I could find. I soon realized a more focused, intensive education would be required to offset the risk this business is prone to. I chose Warrior trading because they offer an open community atmosphere, with patient teachers that are easy to understand, and transparent with their trading experience. I feel the 3 months of serious study and paper trading have fully prepared me to start trading successfully with real money. Thank You Warrior Trading! Ian Galloway
